Kayaking through an amazing tunnel under a karst mountain The most interesting activities within Day 2: Cycling thru the village, rain forest and rice fields; Trekking in the mountain; Kayaking thru Caves w Explore the Sung Sot (Surprise) Cave, one of the most stunning caves in all of Halong Bay BBQ buffet dinner with fresh seafood.
strTitle: 5 Star Package Ha Noi – Halong 4 days
